name: Login-with-lumentis
description: The provided text appears to be a technical design document or specification for the login functionality and user interface of a Progressive Web App (PWA) for a trading platform called ZFX. It outlines the steps and features of the login process, including language selection, phone and email login options, password recovery, and registration redirection. The document is likely written by a product manager or technical lead for the development and QA teams working on the ZFX trading app, with a focus on catering to a primarily Chinese user base while supporting other regions as well.
